messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Toxins Mixing Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Massive bluespace translocation detected.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
It as come to ere ateeenshion that ye ol station has been doi'n poo-erly so we o' cent com has decided to send a rep.. *searching through dictionary* persinatov to check out the station.

We o' centcomm expect a gud ole report from our er.. official.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: ((Centcomm Official) It has been five minutes since I have arrived, and the stations powernet is already failing, what is going on? Fix it!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telec#MCi46:5.;@63-BZZZZT

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: (Centcomm Official) The comms are down, fix them immediately, we cannot do science without radio!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Gross incompetence will result in contract termination, you have been warned.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Ye o' Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on energy emissions we detected, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: (Centcomm) This station is being ran by a skeleton crew, no security and no Captain. Hierarchy is a mess and this is extremely bad for productivity. Designate a Captain immediately.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I am the new cap I will try not to fuck shit up

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: (CENTCOMM) I am seeing a productivity increase, science is at an all time high. Well done crew.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
We have "magically" removed the AI's pressence from the station for reconfiguration.

We are sorry for any inconvinces this might cause and we hope you have a wonderful rest of the shift.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: It's better to describe it as magic then to sit you down through all the technicalities of bluespace and such so just pretend it's magic okay?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: (CENTCOMM) I would like a report on station progress.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: (CENTCOMM) Well done crew, the DNA vault as required has been completed, excellent work. Centcomm is pleased, don't stoop back to the  laughable mess everything was in before.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: (CENTCOMM) There is an extremely rare gondola at the bridge glass, please store it for safe keeping.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: (CENTCOMM) It isn't optional you know, get that Gondola, a rare species safely caged and secured, bring it to the bridge.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: (Centcomm) Having automated drones allows paid workers to be more productive, it will make our job easier.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I finished cleaning the station if one of you degenerate chuckle nuts dirties my station I will personaly pike your head in my office

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Also making a mess is now a low level crime If i catche you its hell to pay

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: (Centcom) Due to the rioting that has insued, we require crew to sign up for security.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: (Centcom) All crew must ignore Dominik, not even acknowledge his existence.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Incinerator.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: What did I say about ignoring him?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Dominick dosent get enough atention from his dead parents dont give him any faggots

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Well then now that we are rid of dominick I have to deal with the shrooms

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: (Centcom) If you need me, I will be resting at the bridge.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Please restore communication and power.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheri:%ï¿½ MCayj^j<.3-BZZZZZZT

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I cant deal the storm has made me black killing my self to preserve my honor

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: (Centcomm) I will be staying at the station while everyone evacuates, I will leave by other means..

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Supply Department

Cargo: Seems we've ordered doubles of our department resupply packages this month. Can we send them to you?
